name: WooCommerce Add to Cart
description: Add a floating cart button that follows your customers as they browse your WooCommerce store. Makes it easy for customers to add products to cart from anywhere on your site!

name: WooCommerce Add to Cart with {product_title}
description: Add a floating add to cart button with product title that follows your customers as they browse your WooCommerce store. Enables customers to quickly add products to cart from anywhere on your site!

name: WooCommerce Apply Coupon
description: Add a floating coupon button that follows your customers as they browse your WooCommerce store. Enables customers to quickly apply coupons from anywhere on your site!

name: WooCommerce Apply Coupon After Last Order
description: Add a floating coupon button that appears within a specific time after customer's last order. Perfect for encouraging repeat purchases with special discounts!

name: WooCommerce Apply Coupon by Cart Quantity
description: Add a floating coupon button that appears when customers reach a specific cart quantity threshold. Perfect for encouraging bulk purchases with special discounts!

name: WooCommerce Apply Coupon by Cart Subtotal
description: Add a floating coupon button that appears when customers reach a specific cart subtotal threshold. Perfect for encouraging larger purchases with special discounts!

name: WooCommerce Apply Coupon by Cart Weight
description: Add a floating coupon button that appears when customers reach a specific cart weight threshold. Perfect for encouraging bulk purchases with special discounts!

name: WooCommerce Apply Coupon After First Order
description: Add a floating coupon button that appears after a customer completes their first order. Perfect for encouraging repeat purchases with special discounts!

name: WooCommerce Apply Coupon for Logged-in Customers
description: Add a floating coupon button that appears only for logged-in customers. Perfect for rewarding your registered customers with exclusive discounts!

name: WooCommerce Apply Coupon for Loyal Customers
description: Add a floating coupon button that appears for loyal customers who have made between 5-10 purchases. Perfect for rewarding mid-tier loyal customers with special discounts!

name: WooCommerce Apply Coupon by Number of Customer Orders
description: Add a floating coupon button that appears when customers reach a specific number of orders. Perfect for rewarding repeat customers with special discounts!

name: WooCommerce Apply Coupon - Spend $X Get Y% Off
description: Add a floating coupon button that appears when customers reach a specific cart subtotal threshold. Perfect for encouraging larger purchases with a 'Spend $X Get Y% Off' promotion!

name: WooCommerce Apply Coupon by Total Customer Spend
description: Add a floating coupon button that appears when customers reach a specific total spend threshold. Perfect for rewarding loyal customers with special discounts!

name: WooCommerce Buy Now
description: Add a floating buy now button that follows your customers as they browse your WooCommerce store. Enables customers to quickly purchase products with a single click from anywhere on your site!

name: WooCommerce Buy Now with {product_title}
description: Add a floating buy now button with product title that follows your customers as they browse your WooCommerce store. Enables customers to quickly purchase products with a single click from anywhere on your site!

name: WooCommerce Cart Reminder
description: Add a floating cart reminder button that follows your customers as they browse your WooCommerce store. Enables customers to quickly check their cart contents and proceed to checkout from anywhere on your site!

name: WooCommerce Customer Button
description: Display a floating button that only appears for customer users. Perfect for quick access to order history, account details, and customer-specific features!

name: WooCommerce Featured Product
description: Add a floating featured product button that highlights your best products as customers browse your WooCommerce store. Perfect for promoting special offers and driving attention to specific products!

name: WooCommerce Bestsellers Popup
description: Display a floating button that shows a popup with bestselling WooCommerce products. Perfect for showcasing your most popular products to customers!

name: WooCommerce Popup Cart Reminder
description: Display a popup when visitors are about to leave your WooCommerce store with items in their cart. Perfect for reducing cart abandonment and encouraging customers to complete their purchase!

name: WooCommerce Featured Product Category Popup
description: Display a floating button that shows a popup with featured products from a specific WooCommerce category. Perfect for highlighting and promoting your best products!

name: WooCommerce Popup for Backordered Products
description: Display a popup for WooCommerce products that are on backorder. Perfect for setting delivery expectations and keeping customers informed!

name: WooCommerce Popup for Out of Stock Products
description: Display a popup for WooCommerce products that are currently out of stock. Perfect for collecting customer interest and providing stock notifications!

name: WooCommerce Popup for Products Price Above {price}
description: Display a popup for WooCommerce products with price above a specified threshold. Perfect for highlighting premium products and exclusive offers!

name: WooCommerce Popup for Products Price Below {price}
description: Display a popup for WooCommerce products with price below a specified threshold. Great for promoting sales and special offers!

name: WooCommerce Popup for Products Quantity Below {quantity}
description: Display a popup for WooCommerce products with stock quantity below a specified threshold. Perfect for creating urgency and highlighting limited availability!

name: WooCommerce Popup for Products Weight Above {weight}
description: Display a popup for WooCommerce products with weight above a specified threshold. Perfect for highlighting shipping requirements and handling instructions for heavy items!

name: WooCommerce Products On Sale Popup
description: Display a floating button that shows a popup with products on sale. This popup is perfect for helping customers quickly access products that are currently on sale!

name: WooCommerce Purchase History Popup
description: Display a floating button that shows a popup with customer's purchase history from WooCommerce. Perfect for helping customers quickly access products they've previously purchased!

name: WooCommerce Recently Viewed Products Popup
description: Display a floating button that shows a popup with recently viewed WooCommerce products. Perfect for helping customers quickly access products they've previously viewed!

name: WooCommerce Scarcity Products Popup
description: Display a floating button that shows a popup with products that are running out of stock. This popup is perfect for helping customers quickly access products that are currently out of stock!

name: WooCommerce Popup Smart Cross-Sells
description: Display a popup for intelligent cross-sell recommendations based on cart contents! Automatically suggests complementary products to increase average order value and boost your store revenue.

name: WooCommerce Popup Smart Upsell
description: Display a popup for intelligent upsell recommendations based on cart contents! Automatically suggests premium or higher-value products to increase average order value and boost your store revenue.

name: WooCommerce Welcome Popup for New Customers
description: Display a welcoming popup for newly registered WooCommerce customers. Perfect for introducing your store, offering first-purchase discounts, and enhancing the shopping experience!

name: WooCommerce Product Information Button
description: Display a floating button that appears only on WooCommerce product pages. Perfect for showing product details, specifications, size guides, or additional information!

name: WooCommerce Shop Manager Button
description: Display a floating button that only appears for shop manager users. Perfect for quick access to product management, order processing, and store administration!
